title: Crater Lake National Park: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Caution        Stage 1 Fire Restrictions in Place  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Stage 1 Fire Restrictions in Place  Backcountry campfires are prohibited. Wood and charcoal fires are permitted only within established grills or fire rings, or portable self-contained grills, in designated areas. Gasoline and propane camp stoves and gas grills are permitted in some areas. more     Information        Crater Lake Rim Run - Partial Temporary Closures  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Crater Lake Rim Run - Partial Temporary Closures  Be prepared for runners on the road 8/13. Rim Drive will not close, but clockwise one-way traffic will be in effect in areas between Watchman Overlook & Phantom Ship Overlook starting at 7 AM. Lost Creek Campground will close from 3 PM 8/12 to 3 PM 8/13. more          Cleetwood Parking Lot To Close for the Season on August 15, 2016  Alert 2 , Severity ,information ,, Cleetwood Parking Lot To Close for the Season on August 15, 2016  The Cleetwood parking lot will close for the season on August 15 for construction. There will be a limited paid shuttle service from Rim Village to Cleetwood Cove trailhead from Aug 15-Sept 5. On Sept 6 the Cleetwood Cove Trail will close until 2017. more            Visit our Current Conditions page to find out what's open in the park this week.
